content: chs flip head to right side slip_stitch in 2nd chain of the ch3 row 4 ch2 double_crochet in same space ch2 skip ch1 space double_crochet-decrease over next 2 sts 2dctog in each of next 4 sts double_crochet- decrease over next 2 sts ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch2 turn 3 row 5 double_crochet in same st as turning ch2 skip chain space double_crochet-decrease over next 2 sts 2dctog in each of next 3 sts 2dc in next st ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch2 turn row 6 double_crochet in same st as turning ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in each of next 3 sts double_crochet in next st double_crochet-decrease over next 2 sts ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch2 turn row 7 double_crochet in same st as turning ch2 skip chain space double_crochet-decrease over next 2 sts double_crochet in next st 2dctog in each of next 2 sts ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch2 turn row 8 double_crochet in same st as turning ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st double_crochet in next st double_crochet-decrease over next 2 sts ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch2 turn row 9 double_crochet in same st as turning ch2 skip chain space double_crochet-decrease over next 3 sts ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch2 turn row 10 double_crochet in same st as turning ch1 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch1 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch2 turn row 11 double_crochet in same st as turning ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made skip chain space skip st skip chain space double_crochet ch2 slip_stitch in next st finish off and tuck in ends https //www facebook com/wanamakerart/ ref=bookmarks https //www etsy com/shop/creativeworkbyannie ref=pr_shop_more https //www ravelry com/designers/ann-wanamaker https //www instagram com/annwanamaker/ special thanks goes ty testers margie smith - jen bee - yvette meador - jerica lourido - antionette kuhnert thank you from the bottom of my heart ann wanamaker
